inclusion.criterion: Neurologic or Neuromuscular restrictive respiratory failure, excluding bulbar involvement
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hospitalization in the home ventilation unit of the Raymond Poincaré Hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: day and night non invasive ventilation during >14hours/day
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: respiratory autonomy of at least one hour of during the day
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ventilation with an assisted and controled mode
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Non covered by the social security system
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine. The genetic survey revealed ADAMTS13 >10%. He was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids.
